fields.text: Welcome to Performance Horizon, your San Francisco-based SaaS partner management platform.
To speak with our sales team about forming and growing partnerships, press [INDEX].
For new partner onboarding and setup assistance, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our partner onboarding team.
For pricing, licensing, and contract inquiries, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team for pricing and licensing details.
If you are an existing partner needing technical support, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support team.
For billing and account management questions, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our billing and account management team.
